test_vectors.name: security_reentrancy_blocked_protocol
test_vectors.description: TAKO prevents re-entrant calls at protocol level

test_vectors.name: security_reentrancy_different_contracts_allowed
test_vectors.description: CPI to different contract is allowed

test_vectors.name: security_reentrancy_cross_contract_chain
test_vectors.description: A -> B -> A call chain is blocked

test_vectors.name: security_reentrancy_state_consistency
test_vectors.description: Failed CPI does not affect caller state

test_vectors.name: security_reentrancy_vs_delegatecall
test_vectors.description: TAKO does not have delegatecall (unlike EVM)
